com.camerontec.catalys.util.marketdata

Interface ISubscriptionListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMarketDataService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyMarketDataService, InternalMarketDataService, MarketDataServiceBase, SampleAggregatedMarketDataService, SampleDerivedPriceMarketDataService, SampleMarketDataService

    public interface ISubscriptionListener
    Market data services support this interface so that other objects can instruct them what subscriptions are required on their instruments.

    Calls to these methods on a market data service are generated by the StandardMarketDataStore where necessary in response to the various add/removeInstrumentListener methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void subscribeForDepth(IInstrument instrument, boolean subscribe)
      Request (or stop) depth (aggregated) updates on the given instrument.
      void subscribeForDetail(IInstrument instrument, boolean subscribe)
      Request (or stop) detail (unaggregated depth) updates on the given instrument.
      void subscribeForSecurityDefinition(IInstrument instrument, boolean subscribe)
      Request (or stop) security definition updates on the given instrument.
      void subscribeForTopOfBook(IInstrument instrument, boolean subscribe)
      Request (or stop) top of book updates on the given instrument.
      void subscribeForTradingStatus(String tradingSessionID, String tradingSesionSubID, boolean subscribe)
      Request (or stop) top of book updates on the given instrument.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribeForDepth

        void subscribeForDepth(IInstrument instrument,
                       boolean subscribe)
                throws SubscriptionException
        Request (or stop) depth (aggregated) updates on the given instrument.
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument (un)subscribing.
        subscribe - True if subscribing, false if unsubscribing.
        Throws:
        SubscriptionException - if there was a problem making the subscription request to the underlying market data source.

      • subscribeForDetail

        void subscribeForDetail(IInstrument instrument,

                 throws SubscriptionException

        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument (un)subscribing.
        subscribe - True if subscribing, false if unsubscribing.
        Throws:
        SubscriptionException - if there was a problem making the subscription request to the underlying market data source.

      • subscribeForTradingStatus

        void subscribeForTradingStatus(String tradingSessionID,
                               String tradingSesionSubID,
                               boolean subscribe)
                        throws SubscriptionException
        Request (or stop) top of book updates on the given instrument.
        Parameters:
        tradingSessionID - a trading session id
        tradingSesionSubID - a trading session subid
        subscribe - True if subscribing, false if unsubscribing.
        Throws:
        SubscriptionException - if there was a problem making the subscription request to the underlying market data source.
